doc.title: Cock Tales
doc.plot: A woman who's off camera asks eight guys questions: what are other words for penis, what would your penis wear if you dressed it, two words it might say, ever measured it, how long is it erect, how long when flaccid, and has it ever been a nuisance? The men, mostly young and of diverse ethnicities, answer with candor and humor. Although they seem to be in a room together, we see the men one at a time, and only their shoulders and heads. All wear shirts.
